document_data.mainbody:
Warrick Marsh was one of the inhabitants of Reithwin, once a Sel√ªnite town in the Western Heartlands, sometime before the late 14 century DR.
Warrick Marsh perished sometime before the fall of Reithwin and it being consumed by the Shadow-cursed Lands before the . He was buried in Reithwins graveyard to the northeast of the House of Healing. His tombstone read "*In Memory of Warrick Marsh, dearly missed by both of his wives." Erricks grave marker remained relatively undamaged as of the .
